welcome_message_body: Welcome to Itako, Japan! Nestled along the picturesque Tone River, our city is known for its quaint charm and traditional festivals. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our rich culture and beautiful surroundings. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Narita International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The secondary terminal at Narita International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Narita International Airport, dedicated to low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may require reconnection every 3 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
